long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that alerts you of how ethical are the companies that created the products you are buying on Amazon. It cross-checks the brand of the product you are currently browsing with over 10 NGOs databases to let you know if that brand is involved with animal testing. If that brand is connected to animal testing, we will warn you, give the source of that information and indicate you to alternative, more ethical products.
